00013 {
00014     behaviors[PASSIVE] = new HungerFactoredPredator();
00015     behaviors[STALKING] = behaviors[PASSIVE];
00016     behaviors[PURSUING] = new AggressivePredator();

00021 FelinePredatorFamily::~FelinePredatorFamily()
